titleInfo.title: Programme zum Zyklus von vierzig Konzerten
Programs for a cycle of forty concerts

mods.abstract: Bound volume containing individual programs from Gottfried Galston's cycle of 40 historical recitals in Munich, Germany, between 1919 and 1921. Concerts occurred Sundays, typically at 4PM (the final concert was at 7:30PM). The programs assert that the concerts share the entirety of significant piano literature from the beginning to the present.
